mapper.select: select c.*, u.username as articleUsername, uu.username as commentUsername, a.title, a.id as articleId from comment c left join article a on a.id = c.article_id left join user u on a.user_id = u.id left join user uu on c.user_id = uu.id where c.user_id = #{userId} order by a.in_time desc
select c.*, u.username, a.title, u.id as user_id, a.id as article_id from comment c left join user u on c.user_id = u.id left join article a on c.article_id = a.id order by c.in_time desc
